mapper.select: select u_id, username, passwd, u_email, u_tel, u_sex, u_datetime, u_photo, u_role, u_status, es_1, es_2, es_3 from users where u_id = #{uId}
mapper.insert: insert into users(username, passwd, u_email, u_tel, u_sex, u_datetime, u_photo, u_role, u_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values (#{username}, #{passwd}, #{uEmail}, #{uTel}, #{uSex}, #{uDatetime}, #{uPhoto}, #{uRole}, #{uStatus}, #{es1}, #{es2}, #{es3})

insert into users(username, passwd, u_email, u_tel, u_sex, u_datetime, u_photo, u_role, u_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.passwd}, #{entity.uEmail}, #{entity.uTel}, #{entity.uSex}, #{entity.uDatetime}, #{entity.uPhoto}, #{entity.uRole}, #{entity.uStatus}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})

insert into users(username, passwd, u_email, u_tel, u_sex, u_datetime, u_photo, u_role, u_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.passwd}, #{entity.uEmail}, #{entity.uTel}, #{entity.uSex}, #{entity.uDatetime}, #{entity.uPhoto}, #{entity.uRole}, #{entity.uStatus}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), passwd = values(passwd), u_email = values(u_email), u_tel = values(u_tel), u_sex = values(u_sex), u_datetime = values(u_datetime), u_photo = values(u_photo), u_role = values(u_role), u_status = values(u_status), es_1 = values(es_1), es_2 = values(es_2), es_3 = values(es_3)
mapper.update:
update users
username = #{username},
passwd = #{passwd},
u_email = #{uEmail},
u_tel = #{uTel},
u_sex = #{uSex},
u_datetime = #{uDatetime},
u_photo = #{uPhoto},
u_role = #{uRole},
u_status = #{uStatus},
es_1 = #{es1},
es_2 = #{es2},
es_3 = #{es3},
where u_id = #{uId}
